Everything's a new experience, what about it?
Endless Eight
Endless Eight
You are late, Kyon!
Show some more motivation!
Yeah, yeah.
Sorry I made you wait.
I just got here, too.
- Okay, we are all here, so let us go.
Where are we going?
To the public swimming pool, of course!
Well, I guess that makes sense considering what I brought.
We have to do summer vacation-y things during our summer vacation!
We can never get back the time that we have lost!
And so we are going to do them now, in our one and only summer as tenth graders.
By the way, we are going to the pool by bike.
Did you ride your bikes, too?
No, the only two bikes we have are yours and mine.
Kyon, you would better not lose to Koizumi.
This train is leaving the station!
No psychic powers allowed!
Hurry up and park your bikes, you two.
Kyon, we are about to go have fun.
This is no time to be exhausted.
Whose fault do you think this is?
Oh, the scent of chlorine.
This really makes it feel like a pool!
Hurry up and get in!
The water's warm so it feels fine!
Cannot she read the no diving signs posted everywhere?
That looks like fun.
She has some rather normal ways of enjoying her time, do not you think?
Miss Suzumiya, laughing and having a good time like that,
is not likely to shake up the world, after all.
I hope that is the case...
What is wrong?
Oh, it is nothing...
It is probably just my imagination.
Let us get ready to go in, too.
It is so bitter.
One more cup, please.
It feels like I have seen this scene once before.
Where Nagato kind of looks like she is bored...
Kyon!
Right, and then Haruhi says this...
These two are my brigade members.
They will do anything you ask, so ask for anything you want!
Okay, let us have some fun!
We are going to play water dodge ball.
Yeah, yeah.
Well, deja vu is not all that uncommon.
I thought about what we will be doing from here on.
What do you think?
What is that?
Things we have to do during our summer vacation
What is that?
Things we have to do during our summer vacation
Things we have to do during our summer vacation
It is a schedule of how we will spend the rest of our short summer vacation.
It is a schedule of how we will spend the rest of our short summer vacation.
I realized that we only have two weeks of summer vacation left.
That fact blew me away.
We still have so much left to do, but we have only got this much time left!
We are going to pick up the pace!
All this in just two weeks?
Is there anything else you want to do, Mikuru?
Umm... I would like to try goldfish scooping.
Okay!
Goldfish scooping...
Pardon me for a moment.
- Thank you. -
We are starting tomorrow!
Is there a place nearby with a Bon festival?
A fireworks show works, too.
I will check around.
I will contact you when I find out.
Do not forget about the goldfish scooping!
It is Mikuru's one request, after all.
Roger that.
All right, then, we are done for today!
- If you will excuse me.
- I have to go, too...
Nagato.
No, it is nothing important.
How have you been?
Everything fine?
Fine.
I see.
That is good to hear.
What the heck?
Why did I talk to her?
Your attention please, we have a lost child.
Five-year-old Takashi Satou is...
A Bon festival, huh?
I guess it makes sense for there to be this many people.
That tower, those vendors...
It is been a while since I have come to one, but it feels like I have recently.
Mikuru!
They have goldfish scooping, just like you wanted!
- Be sure to catch a bunch! - Okay!
Shall we play, too?
How about seeing who can catch more?
I will pass.
What about you, Nagato?
Want to eat something?
You are interested in that stuff?
- Which one? -
It is all right.
- This one.
- Right-o, that will be 800 yen.
I kind of got the feeling that Nagato had been helping us out,
so I thought it would be appropriate for me to at least buy her that, but...
Hamster Fishing
Hamster Fishing Thirteen!
Wow, what a haul!
Thirteen!
Wow, what a haul!
But I do not need so many, so I just kept one.
And one for Mikuru, too.
You can have one, but only one.
Thanks.
Huh?
What is with the mask, Yuki?
I bought it.
I see.
No Obtrusive Fireworks Allowed
No Obtrusive Fireworks Allowed
It was summer, and summer vacation.
It was summer, and summer vacation.
That is why I wanted to forget about it,
Haruhi.
It is fine to want to play around, but are you finished with your summer homework?
What?
You can finish homework like that in just three days.
Three days!?
You get that stuff out of the way so you can have fun without having to worry about it.
Why is she so smart?
It seems like the guys up in heaven that were divvying up...
the stats for us were being pretty lax about it.
Everyone, tomorrow we will be catching bugs!
Whoever catches the most bugs...
Okay, they will get to be the brigade leader for a day!
- No thanks! - That sounds interesting.
Are any bugs okay?
Hmm... only cicadas!
That is it, this will be the SO IS Brigade's Cicada Capturing Competition!
The next day was yet again a beautiful day.
It was on this day that we had the SO IS Brigade Cicada Capturing Competition.
That is sour!
It was on this day that we had the SO IS Brigade Cicada Capturing Competition.
That is not a cicada.
A yanbaru long-armed scarab!?
It looks like each of us did try, in their own way,
but of course, or something to that effect, the winner ended up being Haruhi.
A catch and release attitude is important, right?
If we let them go, then they might come back to repay us.
What could a cicada do, even if it did come back?
There you go!
Go back to the mountains!
For some reason, I kind of feel like Pandora opening her box.
The next day, we met up, even though we had no idea what was going on.
And we remained in the dark even as we were made to wear frog costumes...
and then pass out balloons in front of a supermarket as our part-time job.
I really understand how Unit-o felt when it got hit by that beam.
Good work, everyone.
What is with this difference in how we are being treated?
Thanks for the hard work.
The manager is thankful.
I do not care about his thanks.
Where is our pay?
This is it.
I have wanted this for a while.
We worked, sweat pouring down our foreheads, for that?
Let us hang this up in the clubroom as a memento.
Mikuru, you can wear it whenever you want.
You have my permission!
Okay...
What?
- Oh, nothing. - Do not look at me.
- Come on, Mikuru! - M-Maybe later!
Your popsicle is going to fall down.
That night, a single phone call stole me away from my slumber.
The number you have called is...
What in the world!?
Kyon...
Miss Asahina?
Yes, it is me...
Something... very not good has...
At this rate, I...
- Umm... - Hello, this is Koizumi.
Why are you with Miss Asahina at this hour?
Certain circumstances came up.
Would it be possible for you to come join us right now?
What in the world happened, Miss Asahina?
Kyon... I... cannot go back to the fu-
In other words, this is what is going on.
We are going through an eternal loop of the same time period.
Even if you say something as impossible as that with a smile on your face...
Koizumi, do you realize what you are saying?
I do.
Much more than I wish I did.
I had just been speaking with Miss Asahina.
Call me too, when you have talks with her.
And as a result, what we realized was that recently,
the flow of time was a bit strange.
You might want to credit this to Miss Asahina.
Thanks to her, I was able to confirm it.
Confirm what?
That we have experienced the same span of time numerous times.
You said that earlier.
To be precise, we have been repeating the time from August 17th to the 31st.
We are in the middle of an endless summer vacation.
Well, it is summer vacation, but...
It is a never-ending endless summer.
This world has lost all time after September 1st.
Who would believe that?
We would like for you to believe it.
Umm... I will explain, too.
Well... because of classified information,
I am always contacting the future and classified information-ing,
but I had not received any classified information for about a week or so,
which I thought was strange.
And so I classified information
I was so surprised I tried to classified information,
but it was completely classified information.
Oh, what do I do?
Are we trapped inside one of those closed spaces?
That is not it.
A single portion of time has been torn away.
At exactly the point when it becomes midnight on August 31st,
everything resets, and we go back to August 17th.
That is the process.
So what about our... no, humanity's memories?
Those are reset as well.
Everything starts over from the beginning.
So you mean that time does that thing that you mentioned.
Well, we do have someone from the future here, I guess it cannot be helped.
Oh no, Miss Asahina is not involved in this.
Okay then, what is the culprit?
I would guess Miss Suzumiya.
I am sure she does not realize it, but somewhere inside of her...
What the heck?
Do you mean she feels regret over something?
That is what I believe.
Perhaps she feels that there is something left...
that she wants to do during our summer vacation?
I have been wondering this since I got here, but you seem awfully cheerful about this.
It is because we have finally been able to solve the mystery
of the frequent feelings of deja vu that I have had recently.
Now that I think about it, those inexplicable feelings may have been
remnants from when our memories have been reset.
Is it possible that other people across the world feel this, too?
It does not seem that way.
You and I are a special case.
It appears that the people who are closest to Miss Suzumiya
are able to sense this strangeness.
What about Haruhi?
Does she sense any of this at all?
Not at all, it seems.
It would probably be bad for us if she did.
However, I believe that there is one person who remembers everything,
more than the deja vu that we do.
- Is that right? - It is.
- You remember all of it?
- Right.
So, how many times have we repeated all of this, this time?
This is the 15,521st time.
What do you mean by 15,521?
Are you serious?
I am.
You are saying that we have done the exact same things that many times?
They are not all guaranteed to happen.
Out of 15,521 repetitions, there are two occasions,
2,391 and 11,054, where we did not go to a Bon festival.
A pattern where we did go to a Bon festival,
but did not go to a goldfish scooping stand, occurred 437 times.
We had a part-time job 9,048 times, and when we did,
there are six different kinds of jobs that we did.
In addition to handing out balloons, we also worked as movers, cashiers,
handed out flyers, worked as call center-
I got it, that is enough.
Handed out flyers, worked as call center-
15,521 times, that is what Nagato said.
Times two weeks, hmm, that is around 595 years.
She alone has memories of all that time, repeating it all over and over...
Nagato, how must it feel to experience that same period of time over and over again?
I have heard yet another crazy story.
- I wonder if they exist.
- If what exist?
- Martians. - I kind of do not want them to.
It does not look like anyone's on the surface,
so they are probably a reserved people, living underground.
When man finally sets foot on Mars,
How about if they just appear normally?
Oh, I am bored of this.
UFOs.
Let us look for UFOs.
The next day, we went stargazing.
The location was Nagato's apartment,
and the telescope was one that Koizumi had gotten for us.
Exactly what does she want to do?
Now what could that be?
If we could figure that out, this would all be solved...
How about trying this out?
Give Miss Suzumiya a sudden embrace from behind
then whisper I love you into her ear.
And who would be doing that?
Is there anyone else who could fill the role other than you?
No, I refuse.
All right, how about if I do it?
I am kidding.
I am lacking a certain something for the role.
And all that would do is because unnecessary confusion in Miss Suzumiya.
Hey, Nagato,
you were aware of this loop before Miss Asahina said anything, right?
Yes.
If that is the case, why did not you say anything?
SO IS Brigade Test of Courage Challenge Leave the doll here as proof!
SO IS Brigade Test of Courage Challenge Leave the doll here as proof!
It is my job to observe.
I see...
We continued to run through a torrent of summer vacation events.
We went to a real fireworks show,
and we even took part in a goby fishing tournament.
We also went to a batting center, watched some movies,
went to the beach, went bowling, and even sang karaoke.
We were always doing something.
Of course, I knew that this was not going to satisfy Haruhi.
Even so, there was not anything I could do about it,
and the last days of our summer vacation ticked away.
And so we ended up at August 30th...
With this, we have finished everything on our list.
Hey, no scribbling.
I wonder if this was good enough.
But, hmm...
I guess this works.
Hey, is there anything else you want to do?
That is fine, then.
We were able to do a lot this summer, so that is enough, right?
No, it is not.
You are still not satisfied.
Okay, we are done for today.
I had tomorrow set aside just in case, but you can just take the day off.
Let us meet again in the clubroom the day after tomorrow.
Wait... Haruhi...
Okay, we are done for today.
I had tomorrow set aside just in case, but you can just take the day off.
Let us meet again in the clubroom the day after tomorrow.
I cannot let Haruhi leave.
If she goes, we will end up repeating these past two weeks
for the some-thousandth time.
Okay, we are done for today.
I had tomorrow set aside just in case, but you can just take the day off.
Let us meet again in the clubroom the day after tomorrow.
What should I do?
What should I say?
There must have been a hint somewhere in what Haruhi said.
But what was it?
What has she said up to this point?
I do not know...
I cannot remember...
Okay, we are done for today.
I had tomorrow set aside just in case, but you can just take the day off.
Let us meet again in the clubroom the day after tomorrow.
Whatever, it does not matter anymore.
August 31st.
I have not touched my homework.
Oh, forget it.
If we are just going to do it all over again, then there is no point to doing it.
Whether tomorrow comes or not, I will leave it to the me at that time to deal with it.
